title: British prime minister apologises for her mistakes
description: The British prime minister Liz Truss says sorry after her chancellor tears up almost all of her tax-cutting agenda. Also: UN chief says Ethiopia war is spiralling out of control, and the BBC at 100.
itunes:subtitle: Liz Truss insists she will lead Tories into next election
itunes:summary: The British prime minister Liz Truss says sorry after her chancellor tears up almost all of her tax-cutting agenda. Also: UN chief says Ethiopia war is spiralling out of control, and the BBC at 100.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
